divs: Sighting Detailssaw a flash that was almost the same as a camera from the sky at our house in acampo california and abruptly after that dogs began to bark wildly from all around my girl friend and i had just arived home after dineer and we were both looking opposite directions and we both thought it came from where we were facing...
trends: There have been no other sightings in Acampo
